pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.11.3 Fixes!$(li)Spell Turrets and Runes may now use Warp Scrolls from adjacent inventories with Blink$(li)Fixes crash with carbuncles$(li)Reworks the enchanting apparatus and new feedback on recipes$(li)Vexes will now only target enemies, not the carbuncles!$(li)Adds Summoning Sickness mechanic, more related content soon.

$(li)Adds command to reset mana bonuses from glyphs $(li)Enchanting Apparatus has been reworked to give feedback like the Glyph Press.$(li)Fixes bug with Carbuncles failing to filter when frames were adjacent $(li)Spell Bows may now be enchanted$(li)Fixes Bows and Wands losing their name $(li)Dispel now mimics milk and respects modded effects.$(li)Mana Blooms and seeds are now compostable
$(li)Archwood can now be smelt into charcoal
